text: Reginald Cropper (21 January 1902–1942) was an English professional footballer who played in the Football League for Crystal Palace, Mansfield Town, Norwich City and Tranmere Rovers. ==References== Category:1902 births Category:1942 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:English Football League players Category:Watford F.C. players Category:Notts County F.C. players Category:Norwich City F.C. players Category:Guildford City F.C. players Category:Tranmere Rovers F.C. players Category:Crystal Palace F.C. players Category:Mansfield Town F.C. players
title: Reg Cropper
